title: LoL launcher won't appear on mobile hotspot
body:
Generally I play league without any trouble on other wifi.
But on mobile hotspot, only the league of legends logo shows up and then nothing.
My house won't have any Internet for several weeks!!!!!!!!!!
I've tried most of methods posted on boards, but still doesn't work.
Is it just impossible to play league through 4G?

replies.body: Mobile connections don't play well with league, and you would surely have varying issues with your connection.  The connection may simply not be strong enough to establish a connection to our server and launch the patcher.  You can go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to establish some form of connection, but I highly advise using a stronger connection to prevent a poor experience or even getting leaverbuster.

Have you tried doing a Release/Renew IP and Flush DNS step from here?; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10

You can definitely play from your 4G connection, there's just something blocking it. If nobody here is able to help you please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and be specific as to which steps you have already tried.
